name: TMT
title: Project-3
features: Responsive UI with animation and firebase authentication. Team leader can manage his team members. He can provide review,assign tasks add and remove members and can delete teams.Members can see his completed, uncompleted task and update the pending task etc.
technology: HTML, Tailwind, React, React data table, AOS, Nodemailer, Sendinblue, EmailJs, Node.js, Express.js, Firebase, Mongodb, Heroku

name: Reliable Parts
title: Project-1
features: Responsive UI and firebase authentication. An admin can manage all users, products, orders etc. He can add or delete products.(admin id & pass: tanzid@hasan.com & 123456)Users can order products, update their profile, add a review and can see their orders.
technology: HTML, Tailwind, DaisyUI, React, React router, React query, React toast, React hook form, JWT, Node.js, Express.js, Firebase, Mongodb, Heroku

name: Fresh fruits and vegetables
title: Project-2
features: If a user logs in, he will see manage inventories,  add items, and my item pages. Users can upload , delete, or restock products.
technology: HTML, CSS, React, React bootstrap, React router, React toast, React firebase hooks, Node.js, Express.js, Firebase, Heroku, Mongodb
